hero_title: Your reliable bridge in the global amino acid trade
hero_subtitle: MInternational trading company specializing in feed-grade amino acids. Direct sourcing, strict quality control, developed logistics.
about_history_p1: B2B Co., Ltd. was founded on 22.09.2025 and has been deeply involved in the amino acid industry for many years. Our company is located in Changchun City, Jilin Province, China.
about_history_p2: Our mission is to empower customers with reliable amino acid supply chain services. We strive to become the most respected enterprise in amino acid trade, where honesty is the foundation.
about_history_p3: Our strengths include a strong supply chain, quality control and developed international logistics. We are proud of long-term partnerships with leading manufacturers.
product_methionine_desc: High-quality DL-methionine for optimizing feed formulas and animal growth.
product_valine_desc: Essential amino acid for improving metabolism and animal productivity.
product_threonine_desc: Pure L-threonine for balanced nutrition of farm animals.
product_other_desc: Wide range of feed amino acids for various livestock needs.
contacts_address: Room 1927, Block B, Wanhao Century Plaza, Changchun Economic Development Zone, China
faq_q1: What amino acids do you supply?
faq_a1: We supply a wide range of feed amino acids, including DL-methionine, L-threonine, valine and others. All our products meet international quality standards.
faq_q2: Which countries do you deliver to?
faq_a2: We work with clients worldwide, including China, CIS countries, Europe and other regions. Our developed logistics network allows us to deliver anywhere in the world.
faq_q3: What quality guarantees do you provide?
faq_a3: All our products undergo strict quality control at every stage of delivery. We work only with verified manufacturers and provide all documentation, including certificates.
faq_a4: To place an order, contact us by phone, email or via the website feedback form. Our manager will contact you to clarify all details.
faq_q5: What payment terms do you offer?
faq_a5: We provide flexible payment options, including bank transfer, letters of credit and other methods. Conditions are discussed individually.
